title: Ikke gjør dette mot klimaet
overview: Ikke gjør dette mot klimaet is a spectacular entertainment series with an important message. The series is fronted by two children aged 13 and Newton's famous host, Dennis Siva Lie. The goal is to explain the connection between small things you do in everyday life and the global climate. The TV series provides good advice and tips on how to avoid such disasters, and how you can talk to the children about everyone being able to help slow down development.
